AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where aliens were being smuggled into and where undocumented aliens were attempted to be brought into
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo: city where permit was obtained and smuggling operation proceeded
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Sabinas Hidalgo: city where meeting with undocumented aliens took place and where Alfredo Ortega-Chavez was allegedly seen by Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's parents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a restaurant in Sabinas Hidalgo: location of meeting between smugglers and undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio, Texas: location where Graciela Castaneda and her husband had brunch with Alfredo Ortega-Chavez
